title: Bengali Mussulmani (1878) Matthew
description: Bengali Mussulmani translation of the Gospel of Matthew published in 1878 by H. C. Raha. Bengali Mussulmani is a dialect of Bengali spoken by Bangladeshis of Persian extraction.

language.name: Bengali
language.area: West. Also in Canada, India, Malawi, Nepal, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States.
